Classes

    calibrate
    To calibrate the data and save the sigma and incidence angle in geotiff format. This class contain the following functions:

    	speckle_filter => This has two filters (median and wiener)
	save_tiff => this functions save the output sigma_naught in geotiff format
	incidence_angle => this functions calculate the incidence angle and save it as geotiff format
